alert.note: Alert for Adair (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 15 at 6:14PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Adair and southern Cherokee Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 614 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 3 miles northeast of Pumpkin Center, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Tahlequah... Cookson... Eldon... Pumpkin Center... Cherokee Landing State Park... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for east central Oklahoma.
